r.d: NIS (formerly called Yellow Pages) allows network management of important administrative files (e.g. the password file).
r.n:
Initial stable release
- Fix build with modern PHP including PHP 5.3, 5.4 and 5.5 [gasolwu] - Build testing environment with vagrants [gasolwu] - Add tests for all public functions [gasolwu] - Fix bugs #59537 [gasolwu] - Correct constant value of YPERR_ACCESS [gasolwu]
